extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Product and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is running a vulnerable version of Ivanti Standalone Sentry or Ivanti Neurons for ITSM.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Ivanti Standalone Sentry
extracted_playbook.description: Update Ivanti Standalone Sentry to the latest version as per vendor instructions to mitigate CVE-2023-41724.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Ivanti Neurons for ITSM
extracted_playbook.description: Update Ivanti Neurons for ITSM to the latest version as per vendor instructions to mitigate CVE-2023-46808.
